BadgeDetail.Name: Steering I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner has demonstrated the fundamental knowledge relating to steering. This includes inspecting ball joints and steering column for free play, assessing rack gaiters, topping up a PAS system and replacing a track rod end.

Task.Title: Free play
Task.Body: Upload evidence inspecting ball joints and steering column for free play.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence inspecting ball joints and steering column for free play.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence inspecting ball joints and steering column for free play.

Task.Title: Assess and fix
Task.Body: Upload evidence assessing rack gaiters, topping up a PAS system and replacing a track rod end.

Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence assessing rack gaiters, topping up a PAS system and replacing a track rod end.
